name: Penguins+
description:
This is to test server infrastructure and multiplayer functionality.

It's an early working prototype with simple rooms, chat, clothing, a shop and some basic features.

No mini games yet and probably some bugs. Please take a look if you get a chance!

Just click register and make a penguin name and password. I recommend something unique from your other passwords to be safe. All passwords are stored in a secure hash in our database.

Ingame controls:

'Left Click' to move

'Right Click' or 'T' key to throw a snowball

'I' key to open/close inventory

'U' key open/close shop

'Left Click' an item in inventory to equip/unequip for that slot. 'Left 'Click a store item to purchase it.

'D' to dance

'S' to do situps

'W' to wave

'C' to toggle basic chat log

'Enter' to focus the chat inputbox, hit it again to send chat

'/I name' or '/Ignore name' to ignore a specific penguin. This is currently only persisted per login session.

'/I' or '/Ignore' to list all ignored penguins in the chat log.
